fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Pray. Increase Summoning by 1 if no one visits you.
- At night, attempt to Sacrifice a player. If they are not visited by anyone but you tonight, you'll attack them and gain 1 Summoning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a Summoning meter that goes up to 5.
- Your Summoning gain is doubled on nights with full moons.
- At 5 Summoning you leave the town in victory after summoning the Great Winged One. When the Great Winged One is summoned, the following day, the hanged player will be cleaned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
